Implementation Examples in Matlab¶

The following examples are meant to better illustrate the information given in the theory overview.

1D Klein-Gordon¶

This is one of the simplest examples that demonstrates the effectiveness of the CRBC/DAB type boundary conditions.

  • 1D Klein-Gordon
    • Introduction
    • The commented program

2D Wave Equation¶

This example shows how the boundary conditions can be implemented in 2D on a single boundary face for a scalar wave equation.

  • 2D Wave Equation
    • Introduction
    • The commented program

2D Klein-Gordon with a Corner¶

The example implements a corner where two DAB layers intersect for the 2D Klein-Gordon equation.

  • 2D Klein-Gordon with a Corner
    • Introduction
    • The commented program
